title: Oat-crusted pork medallions with spicy mushroom sauce
ingredients: ['400g lean pork fillet', '2 tablespoons rapeseed oil', '125g oats', '2 teaspoons chilli powder', '320g pack mushrooms, sliced', '2 teaspoons Worcestershire sauce', '4 teaspoons reduced salt gravy granules', '25g pack parsley, chopped']
